thread.title: Glencore Crash: Sharing in the Commodities Giant’s Misery
thread.title_full: Glencore Crash: Sharing in the Commodities Giant’s Misery - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: Glencore Crash: Sharing in the Commodities Giant’s Misery
text:
Asian commodities house Noble Group has been under siege since critics began assailing its accounting in February. Now, the woes of trading peer Glencore are adding to Noble’s sense of peril.
The 24% plunge Monday in miner-cum-trader Glencore’s London shares triggered a 10% drop in Noble’s Singapore-listed stock Tuesday. Noble’s 2020 bonds at one point Tuesday also fell by 20 cents on the dollar to around 60 cents, according to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
